entry.title: Mixer discussions banned on Bitcointalk
entry.summary: The distinction between what is permissible and what is not in the realm of Bitcoin mixing discussions hinges on the nature of the content shared. Discussions that pertain to research and open-source software related to mixing technology are considered acceptable. These discussions can include general conversations about mixers, delving into their technological aspects and contributions to the field without breaching community guidelines. Conversely, direct advertising or promotion of products and services, such as linking to specific mixers or endorsing them, falls outside the scope of acceptable content. This clear demarcation ensures that discussions remain informative and relevant to the interests of the community focused on the exploration and understanding of Bitcoin without becoming a platform for commercial advertisement. By adhering to these rules, members can ensure that their contributions to the forum align with its intended purpose and maintain the integrity of the discussions held within the Delving Bitcoin community.
